member.name: T:BabakSoft.Platform.Web.Markup.HtmlMarkup
member.summary: Provides a convenient class for constructing a tree of HTML elements and rendering them as HTML markup.
member.remarks: This class generates HTML markup that conforms to HTML5 standard. However, methods in this class do not check for invalid element names or HTML5 element nesting rules.

member.name: P:BabakSoft.Platform.Web.Markup.HtmlMarkup.Element
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML element name for this instance. No validation is performed, so illegal names can be used. Caller is responsible for using valid HTML element names.

member.name: P:BabakSoft.Platform.Web.Markup.HtmlMarkup.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text content for this instance.
member.remarks: This class does not automatically encode special characters that must be escaped in HTML. But if the HTML rendered by this class is wrapped in an MvcHtmlString object, it will be properly encoded.
